1.content:
You stop at an item store, upon the recommendation of the townsfolk. There you meet the shopkeeper. A dark-elf with striking green eyes and dark silky hair that fell over her shoulders in luscious curls. Over the counter you cant help but notice her low-cut pink blouse, which proudly revealed what was at least a D-cup chest.

Forcing your gaze away you mention that you are starting a new life as an adventurer. The shopkeep smiles and explains that the local government offers starting kits for new adventurers looking to join any of the local guilds. She offers the following classes...

Warrior:
Your typical sword-wielding hero

Rogue:
One who uses stealth and cunning to overcome whatever lies in their way

Mage:
A user of magic, capable of casting powerful spells

Ranger:
A fighter attuned with nature and skilled with a bow

Artificer:
Creator of magical gadgets and machines to do all the heavy lifting for you.

Which do you choose?
1.title: Choose your class!

info.brief_description: A fantasy choose-your-own-adventure where the main heroine goes through many changes...
info.description:
Your name is Pearl. You are a young woman, have just turned eighteen, heading toward the city of Tutoria to start your new life as an adventurer.

Starting appearance:

Height: 5'4"

Build: skinny

Cup size: A

Waist size: Extra-small

Hair: black, strait cut

Eyes: light blue

You have little to your name but the ragged clothes on your back, but you are determined to become great.

Your journey begins here...
